A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Before I begin my review\, please note that I am a true Star Wars fan. I saw Star Wars IV at least three times the first week out at age 11. This episode was just okay. I give it a C to C+. Luke\, Leia\, Chewy\, and the Millineum Falcon....truly nostalgic. We need George Lucas Back and Disney out!!!! The plot was choppy and the ending was poorly done. Episode VII had a much better plot. Who ever placed this episode in the category with The Empire Strikes Back was sadly mistaken.
